column3: Latest;Tbong Khmom: 39 high school students fainted on January 17 and the morning of the 18th.------On January 17
column5: 12 students of Krouch Kul High School collapsed. On the morning of January 18
column7: 27 other students fainted while standing for the flag and national anthem.------The provincial governor confirmed that all the fainted students were taken to the Kroch Chhmar district hospital
column8: but none were suffering any serious complaints.------Low blood sugar levels and tiredness have been speculated as the cause.------More images: ------NKD
